languages.text: {n}Губы Кляйна подрагивают, а глаза выпучены. Он не перестает обтирать покрасневшие руки тряпкой со стерилизующим составом.{/n} "Непередаваемая мерзость. Вы не представляете что внутри этой... твари. Это нужно было сжечь сразу — тот, кто его убил, не доделал свою работу".

{n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Klein se mettent à trembler, ses yeux s'écarquillent et il frotte frénétiquement ses mains ensanglantées avec un linge imbibé de désinfectant.{/n} « C'est tout bonnement révoltant. Vous n'imaginez pas ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur de cette... chose. On aurait dû brûler son corps sur-le-champ. Quel qu'il soit, son assassin aurait dû aller jusqu'au bout de sa démarche. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Klein se mettent à trembler, ses yeux s'écarquillent et il frotte frénétiquement ses mains ensanglantées avec un linge imbibé de désinfectant.{/n} « C'est tout bonnement révoltant. Vous n'imaginez pas ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur de cette... chose. On aurait dû brûler son corps sur-le-champ. Quel qu'il soit, son assassin aurait dû aller jusqu'au bout de sa démarche. »

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Klein tiemblan. Sus ojos sobresalen de sus órbitas. Parece incapaz de dejar de limpiarse las manos enrojecidas con un trapo empapado de desinfectante.{/n} «Repugnante. Indescriptible. No puede siquiera imaginar lo que hay dentro de... esa cosa. Deberían haber quemado el cuerpo al momento. Quien lo matara debió haber terminado el trabajo».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Klein tiemblan. Sus ojos sobresalen de sus órbitas. Parece incapaz de dejar de limpiarse las manos enrojecidas con un trapo empapado de desinfectante.{/n} «Repugnante. Indescriptible. No puede siquiera imaginar lo que hay dentro de... esa cosa. Deberían haber quemado el cuerpo al momento. Quien lo matara debió haber terminado el trabajo».

languages.text: {n}克莱因的嘴唇颤抖着，眼睛鼓了起来，一刻不停地用浸透了消毒剂的抹布擦拭着发红的双手。{/n}“真让人恶心，简直无法形容。您根本无法想象这具……东西内部是什么样子，凶手真该当场把这具尸体烧掉。虽然不知道凶手是谁，但应该是不久前才刚刚完成这场凶杀。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因的嘴唇颤抖着，眼睛鼓了起来，一刻不停地用浸透了消毒剂的抹布擦拭着发红的双手。{/n}“真让人恶心，简直无法形容。您根本无法想象这具……东西内部是什么样子，凶手真该当场把这具尸体烧掉。虽然不知道凶手是谁，但应该是不久前才刚刚完成这场凶杀。”

languages.text: {n}クラインの唇が震えた。目が大きく見開かれている。消毒液に浸した雑巾で赤くなった手を拭くのを止められないようだ。{/n} 「気持ち悪い。言葉にならない。あの中に何が入っていたのか、きっと当てられないよ…。死体はその場で焼却すべきだった。誰が殺したにせよ、あの場で終わらせるべきだったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインの唇が震えた。目が大きく見開かれている。消毒液に浸した雑巾で赤くなった手を拭くのを止められないようだ。{/n} 「気持ち悪い。言葉にならない。あの中に何が入っていたのか、きっと当てられないよ…。死体はその場で焼却すべきだった。誰が殺したにせよ、あの場で終わらせるべきだったんだ」

languages.text: {n}Kleins Lippen zittern. Seine Augen treten hervor. Er wischt sich unaufhörlich die geröteten Hände an einem mit Desinfektionsmittel getränkten Lumpen ab.{/n} "Widerlich. Unaussprechlich. Ihr könnt Euch gar nicht vorstellen, was in diesem ... Ding liegt. Sie hätten den Leichnam gleich an Ort und Stelle verbrennen sollen. Wer auch immer ihn getötet hat, hätte es einfach zu Ende bringen sollen."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."

Wer auch immer ihn getötet hat, hätte es einfach zu Ende bringen sollen."

languages.text: {n}Klein'ın dudakları titriyor ve gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Hâlihazırda kızaran ellerini dezenfektana batırdığı kumaş parçasıyla silmeyi bir türlü bırakamıyormuş gibi duruyor.{/n} "İğrenç. Kelimelerle anlatılamaz. O... Şeyin içinde ne olduğunu hayal bile edemezsiniz. Cesedi buldukları yerde yakacaklardı. Onu her kim öldürdüyse işini bitirecekti."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's lips tremble. His eyes bulge. He seems unable to stop wiping his reddened hands with a rag soaked in disinfectant.{/n} "Disgusting. Unspeakable. You can't even imagine what's inside that... thing. They should've burned the body right there and then. Whoever killed him should've just finished the job."
